sentences.sContent: The victim received head injuries from which she died a week later.
sentences.sCn: 受害人头部受伤，一周后死亡。

sentences.sContent: a credit card fraud ring that stole millions of dollars from unsuspecting victims
sentences.sCn: 从毫无戒心的受害者手中盗取数百万美元的信用卡诈骗团伙

phrases.pCn: 成为…的牺牲品；成为…的受害者；屈服于…；被…降服

remMethod.val: vict(征服)+im→被征服的→受害人，牺牲品

trans.tranOther: someone who has been attacked, robbed, or murdered
